revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Love and madness : a story too true in a series of letters between parties, whose names would perhaps be mentioned, were they less known, or less lamented, by Sir He..."
revision.text: Possibly: Love and madness : a story too true in a series of letters between parties, whose names would perhaps be mentioned, were they less known, or less lamented, by Sir Herbert Croft. (London : Printed for G. Kearsly ; and R. Faulder, 1780). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/875070621
